1.0.0.name: wordpress/eliminate-notify-email
1.0.0.description: This WordPress plugin eliminates the New User ntotification e-mail from being sent to new users. Be aware, that you need to have a provision for giving new users a password. This does not disable the New User email notification that might be sent to admin if so configured.
